remarks: A functor maps composition in the source category to composition in the target.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
funcco.b $e |- B = ( Base ` D ) $.
funcco.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` D ) $.
funcco.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` D ) $.
funcco.O $e |- O = ( comp ` E ) $.
funcco.f $e |- ( ph -> F ( D Func E ) G ) $.
funcco.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
funcco.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
funcco.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
funcco.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( X H Y ) ) $.
funcco.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( Y H Z ) ) $.
funcco $p |- ( ph -> ( ( X G Z ) ` ( N ( <. X , Y >. .x. Z ) M ) ) = ( ( ( Y G Z ) ` N ) ( <. ( F ` X ) , ( F ` Y ) >. O ( F ` Z ) ) ( ( X G Y ) ` M ) ) ) $.
